outline.title: Executive Summary: System Integrity Confirmed
outline.summary: Overview of the verification audit confirming 100% accuracy of exchange rates and system reliability.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/oHYuGm4CmhsG.png - The title slide is about an exchange rate verification report. Image 7 shows currency exchange (Dollar and Euro) with arrows, which is a good visual metaphor for the report's topic.

outline.title: Verification Methodology
outline.summary: Details the testing protocol using XE.com and CoinGecko as benchmarks against the live converter.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/rLijJxhA067l.png - This slide is the Executive Summary confirming system integrity and accuracy. Image 4, a calculator with coins, visually represents calculation, verification, and financial results.

outline.title: USDT to GBP Verification Results
outline.summary: Analysis of USDT/GBP rate accuracy showing negligible variance and confirming the 1:1 USD peg.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/O2hOSchumiJ3.png - This slide details the verification methodology, which involves calculations and financial data. Image 5, a calculator with a dollar sign, is a simple and relevant icon for the methodology section.

outline.title: GBP to USD Verification Results
outline.summary: Verification of GBP/USD rate showing high precision and alignment with institutional market rates.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/ZaC5cr2NBevc.jpg - This slide focuses on the USDT to GBP verification. Images 1, 2, and 3 all feature USDT/USDC. Image 1 is the most visually clean and directly represents the crypto assets being verified (USDT and USDC).

outline.title: Live API Performance Status
outline.summary: Report on the CoinGecko API integration, update frequency, and system reliability.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/XkPgktQQVhKm.png - This slide focuses on the GBP to USD verification, which is a fiat-to-fiat exchange. Image 8 shows a currency exchange (Yen and Dollar) with arrows, which is a clear visual for the currency conversion process.

outline.title: Conclusion and Next Steps
outline.summary: Final assessment of system health and recommendations for continued operation.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/RobcDbp9mZKw.png - This is the conclusion slide, summarizing the system's "GREEN / HEALTHY" status and recommending proceeding with the deployment. Image 6, a money bag and a calculator, represents the successful financial verification and readiness for production.
